description:
+++ Update+++

1000+ students enrolled in the first 48 hours! Join this community to learn and enjoy all the benefits of the wheatgrass today!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't pay higher prices buying a small portion of wheatgrass at a fancy supermarket or farmers market, you will learn how you can do it yourself in the comfort of your home spending almost nothing, and you can do it over and over... Healthy, Organic Wheatgrass that will Supercharge the nutrition on your body and will revolutionize how you feel.

Wheatgrass is consider one of the grass with higher nutritional value, full of chlorophyll.

Wheatgrass is a natural source of vitamins and minerals (a few of which are antioxidants) including:

    ·Vitamins A, E, and B-12

    ·Calcium

    ·Selenium

    ·Magnesium

    ·Iron

You will learn the exact process you need to follow to Juice Organic wheatgrass in your own home.

That includes:

    ·Benefits of drinking wheatgrass juice

    ·The process to germinate the seeds

    ·How to plant and harvest

    ·And finally Juicing Wheatgrass

I'll give you the best recipe so you can plant your own Organic wheatgrass, take care of it, harvest and finally juice and drink the “magic" green juice.
title: SUPER FOODS: Supercharge Your Body With Nutrition Wheatgrass
